alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; Dinwiddie; Henrico; Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 7:00PM EDT until April 06 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chesterfield County in central Virginia... The City of Colonial Heights in central Virginia... The City of Hopewell in south central Virginia... The City of Petersburg in south central Virginia... Northwestern Charles City County in east central Virginia... Northwestern Prince George County in south central Virginia... Southeastern Henrico County in central Virginia... Northeastern Dinwiddie County in south central Virginia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 700 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chesterfield Court House to near Matoaca to Sutherland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Chesterfield Court House around 705 PM EDT. Matoaca around 710 PM EDT. Colonial Heights, Virginia State University, Chester, Ettrick and Bellwood around 715 PM EDT. Petersburg and Fort Lee around 720 PM EDT. Hopewell around 725 PM EDT. Prince George around 730 PM EDT. Jordans Point around 735 PM EDT. Garysville around 745 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Wayside, Birchett Estate, Addison, Elko, Jordan Point Country Club, Petersburg National Battlefield, Glendale, Pocahontas State Park, New Bohemia and Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; Dinwiddie; Henrico; Prince George
